uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.493.title: Second Reading: Kew Gardens (Leases) (No. 3) Bill [Lords]
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.493.content: I beg to move, That the Bill be now read a Second time.

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.504.title: Kew Gardens (Leases) (No. 3) Bill [Lords] (Programme)
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.504.content:
Motion made, and Question put forthwith (Standing Order No. 83A(7)),
That the following provisions shall apply to the Kew Gardens (Leases) (No. 3) Bill [Lords]:
Committal
(1) The Bill shall be committed to the Legislative Grand Committee (England).
Proceedings in the Legislative Grand Committee (England), on Consideration and up to and including Third Reading
(2) Proceedings in the Legislative Grand Committee (England) on the Bill, proceedings on Consideration and any proceedings in legislative grand committee on a consent motion shall (so far as not previously concluded) be brought to a conclusion two hours after the commencement of proceedings in the Legislative Grand Committee (England) on the Bill.
(3) Proceedings on Third Reading shall (so far as not previously concluded) be brought to a conclusion three hours after the commencement of proceedings in the Legislative Grand Committee (England) on the Bill.
(4) Standing Order No. 83B (Programming committees) shall not apply to proceedings in the Legislative Grand Committee (England) on the Bill or to proceedings on Consideration and up to and including Third Reading.
Other proceedings
(5) Any other proceedings on the Bill may be programmed.—(Rebecca Harris.)

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.506.title: Approve: Climate Change Act 2008 (2050 Target Amendment) Order 2019
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.506.content:
I beg to move,
That the draft Climate Change Act 2008 (2050 Target Amendment) Order 2019, which was laid before this House on 12 June, be approved.

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.530.title: Approve: Climate Change Act 2008 (2050 Target Amendment) Order 2019
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.530.content:
Resolved,
That the draft Climate Change Act 2008 (2050 Target Amendment) Order 2019, which was laid before this House on 12 June, be approved.

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.530.title: Estimates (Liaison committee Recommendation)
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.530.content:
Motion made, and Question put forthwith (Standing Order No. 145(3)),
That this House agrees with the Report of the Liaison Committee of 18 June 2019:
(1) That a day not later than 5 August be allotted for the consideration of the following Estimates for financial year 2019–20: Department for Work and Pensions, and Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government;
(2) That a further day not later than 5 August be allotted for the consideration of the following Estimates for financial year 2019–20: Department for International Development, and Department for Education.—(Matt Warman.)

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.531.title: Adjournment (Summer)
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.531.content:
Motion made, and Question put forthwith (Standing Order No. 25),
That this House, at its rising on Thursday 25 July 2019, do adjourn until Tuesday 3 September 2019.—(Matt Warman.)

uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.534.title: Adjournment Debate: Smart Cities
uk.org.publicwhip/debate/2019-06-24b.534.content: Motion made, and Question proposed, That this House do now adjourn.—(Matt Warman.)
